title: Jake Brancatella discusses his debate with Dr James White on the Trinity with a Unitarian Christian
description:
Jake Brancatella, aka the Muslim Metaphysician, is the host of his own youtube channel and is a cohost on Thought Adventure channel. He recently had a debate on The Trinity vs Tawhid with Dr James White from "The Firing Line". In this conversation Jake and I discuss that debate, go into further detail on some of the arguments, and try to further elucidate with Dr. James White might actually believe about the trinity. 

Jake's Debate with James White: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xh13mb4Hz1E&t=1550s

Thought Adventure Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/ThoughtAdventurePodcast

The Muslim Metaphysician Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/TheMuslimMetaphysician

We also mention Dr Dale Tuggy, Dr Beau Branson, Chris Date, Dr Richard Swinburn, Dr William Lane Craig, Dr Jousha Sijuwade, Dr Ryan Mullins, Herman Alexander Roell, B.B. Warfield,  Bishop Barron, and many others. 

00:00:00 - Introduction and Background
00:11:15 - Jake's first argument
00:22:25 - Jake's second argument
00:29:00 - Elucidating Dr. White's Trinitarianism
00:48:35 - Dr White and the Nicene Creed
01:02:30 - Dr White's Problem with Christian History
01:12:00 - Is of identity and Is of predication
01:17:45 - Dr. White's definition of monotheism
01:22:20 - Chris Date and Dr White's Trinity Theory
01:33:15 - Dr White's arguments against the Quran
01:44:45 - The Trinity in the Quran
01:49:30 - Dr White and the love argument
01:52:00 - Concluding Remarks
